sentences.en: a graduate in history
sentences.cn: 历史学学士

sentences.en: a graduate of Edinburgh University
sentences.cn: 爱丁堡大学的毕业生

sentences.en: a graduate student
sentences.cn: 研究生

sentences.en: a Harvard graduate
sentences.cn: 哈佛毕业生

sentences.en: a history graduate
sentences.cn: 历史专业毕业生

sentences.en: About 40% of all students entering as freshmen graduate within 4 years.
sentences.cn: 所有入学新生中约有40%在4年内毕业。

sentences.en: As an actress she has graduated from small roles to more substantial parts.
sentences.cn: 作为演员，她从配角演起，慢慢地开始出演比较重要的角色。

sentences.en: Chicago has 6 graduate and professional schools of high repute.
sentences.cn: 芝加哥有6所颇负盛名的研究生院和专业院校。

sentences.en: Children graduate to the kindergarten, then pre-school, and then school.
sentences.cn: 孩子们先上幼儿园，然后上学前班，再接着上小学。

sentences.en: He needs three more credits to graduate.
sentences.cn: 他需要再修3个学分才能毕业.

sentences.en: He was a college graduate.
sentences.cn: 他是个大学毕业生.

sentences.en: I'm fixing to go to graduate school.
sentences.cn: 我打算去读研究生。

sentences.en: In practice a graduate tax is an administrative nightmare.
sentences.cn: 毕业税具体操作起来不啻一场行政噩梦。

sentences.en: Kate graduated from medical school last year.
sentences.cn: 凯特去年从医学院毕业了。

sentences.en: Mary, a junior, will graduate next year.
sentences.cn: 玛丽, 一名三年级的中学生, 明年将毕业.

sentences.en: Now he needs only two credit hours to graduate.
sentences.cn: 现在他只需再修两个学分就可以毕业了。

sentences.en: Professor Zhu will give lectures to the postgraduates [ graduate students ] this term.
sentences.cn: 朱教授这学期给研究生 开课.

sentences.en: She is a graduate nurse.
sentences.cn: 她是护士学院的毕业生.

sentences.en: The university must graduate more science students.
sentences.cn: 该大学要有更多的理科学生毕业.

sentences.en: To graduate Cum laude is to graduate with honor.
sentences.cn: 优等毕业即光荣的毕业.

sentences.en: university graduates
sentences.cn: 大学毕业生

sentences.en: We've heard that you would graduate soon.
sentences.cn: 我们听说你很快就要毕业了.

sentences.en: When the boys graduated from high school, Ann moved to a small town in Vermont.
sentences.cn: 男孩们中学毕业后安迁到了佛蒙特州的一座小镇。

分阶段；定等级；坡度缓和

使毕业；毕业（graduate的过去分词）；使…升级

phrases.tran_cn: 大学毕业生；大专以上学历
研究生证书，硕士证书；毕业证书

trans.tran_en: relating to or involved in studies done at a university after completing a first degree
someone who has completed a university degree, especially a first degree

trans.tran_cn: 获得学位，授予学位文凭，中学毕业，晋升
trans.tran_en: to obtain a degree, especially a first degree, from a college or university
to obtain a degree, especially a first degree, from a college or university
